Package org.ejbca.core.ejb.ra

Interface EndEntityManagementSessionLocal

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EndEntityManagementSession
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EndEntityManagementSessionBean
    public interface EndEntityManagementSessionLocal
extends EndEntityManagementSession
    Local interface for EndEntityManagementSession.

    • Method Detail

      • canonicalizeUser

        EndEntityInformation canonicalizeUser​(EndEntityInformation endEntity)
                               throws CustomFieldException
        Validates the name and DN in an end entity and canonicalizes/strips the attributes. This method is called by addUser.
        Parameters:
        endEntity - entity
        Returns:
        a copy of endEntity with the canonicalized changes. Does not modify its parameter.
        Throws:
        CustomFieldException - if if the end entity was not validated by a locally defined field validator

      • checkForCAId

        boolean checkForCAId​(int caid)
        Methods that checks if a user exists in the database having the given caid. This function is mainly for avoiding desynchronization when a CAs is deleted.
        Parameters:
        caid - the id of CA to look for.
        Returns:
        true if caid exists in UserData table.

      • checkForHardTokenProfileId

        boolean checkForHardTokenProfileId​(int profileid)
        Methods that checks if a user exists in the database having the given HardTokenProfile id. This function is mainly for avoiding desynchronization when a HardTokenProfile is deleted.
        Parameters:
        profileid - of HardTokenProfile to look for.
        Returns:
        true if profileid exists in UserData table.

      • cleanUserCertDataSN

        void cleanUserCertDataSN​(EndEntityInformation data)
                  throws NoSuchEndEntityException
        Cleans the certificate serial number from the user data. Should be called after the data has been used.
        Parameters:
        data - data
        Throws:
        NoSuchEndEntityException - if no end entity was found

      • cleanUserCertDataSN

        void cleanUserCertDataSN​(String username)
                  throws ApprovalException,
                         WaitingForApprovalException,
                         NoSuchEndEntityException
        Removes the certificate serial number from the user data.
        Parameters:
        username - the unique username.
        Throws:
        ApprovalException - approval
        WaitingForApprovalException - approval
        NoSuchEndEntityException - if the end entity was not found

      • decRequestCounter

        int decRequestCounter​(String username)
               throws NoSuchEndEntityException,
                      ApprovalException,
                      WaitingForApprovalException
        Decreases (the optional) request counter by 1, until it reaches 0. Returns the new value. If the value is already 0, -1 is returned, but the -1 is not stored in the database. Also sets status of user to generated once the request counter reaches zero.
        Parameters:
        username - the unique username.
        Returns:
        counter
        Throws:
        NoSuchEndEntityException - if user does not exist
        ApprovalException - fail
        WaitingForApprovalException - fail

      • updateCAId

        void updateCAId​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                String username,
                int newCAId)
         throws AuthorizationDeniedException,
                NoSuchEndEntityException
        Changes the CAId of the given end-entity. Intended to be used when an uninitialized CA's subject DN and CAId is changed (CAs can be in the uninitialized state when they have been imported from a statedump).
        Parameters:
        admin - Authentication token
        username - End-entity to change CAId of
        newCAId - CA id to change to.
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - fail
        NoSuchEndEntityException - fail
